headline: Yum! Brands (NYSE:YUM) Declares US$0.71 Dividend Per Share For June 2025
summary: Yum! Brands (NYSE:YUM) recently affirmed a quarterly dividend of $0.71 per share, set to be distributed in early June, which aligns with general shareholder value enhancement strategies. Over the past month, the company's stock price moved 1.63%, in line with overarching market trends, as major indices such as the S&P 500 posted significant gains. During this period, Yum! Brands also reported quarterly earnings showing increased sales and revenue but a dip in net income, alongside a share...
